meanings.definition: To become or make larger or more extensive
meanings.sent1: When you blow up a balloon, it expands and gets bigger.
meanings.sent2: The population of the city expands as more people move in.
meanings.sent3: The cake batter expands in the oven, creating a delicious treat.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter expands throughout the room, filling it with joy.
meanings.sent5: The universe expands endlessly, with galaxies stretching out into space.

meanings.definition: To open up, unfold, or stretch out
meanings.sent1: The flower expands its petals in the morning sunlight.
meanings.sent2: As the book unfolds, the plot expands to reveal new twists.
meanings.sent3: The map expands to show more details when you zoom in.
meanings.sent4: His mind expands like a blooming flower, taking in new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The wings of the bird expand as it takes flight, reaching for the sky.

meanings.definition: To increase in size, volume, or quantity
meanings.sent1: The company expands its product line to include more options.
meanings.sent2: With each raindrop, the puddle expands in size.
meanings.sent3: The excitement in the room expands as the concert approaches.
meanings.sent4: Her love for animals expands to include all creatures, big and small.
meanings.sent5: The music festival expands to a week-long event, attracting more attendees.
